name: SabbathDayThoughts
0:
”Alexa, open Sabbath Day Thoughts”
”Alexa, start Sabbath Day Thoughts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sabbath day thoughts
des:
Whether only on the Sabbath day, or everyday of the week, listen to inspiring quotes from leaders of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints regarding the Sabbath day. These inspired words can help you in making the Sabbath day a delight. 
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
